explains: v. 协助；援助（assist 的过去式）
wordGroup: computer assisted 计算机辅助的
assisted suicide 协助自杀；帮助自杀

sentences.en: We were ably assisted by a team of volunteers.
sentences.cn: 我们得到一批志愿者的大力协助。

sentences.en: He was ably assisted by a number of members from other branches.
sentences.cn: 他得到了其他部门的几个成员的得力协助。

sentences.en: Treatments using assisted reproduction techniques jumped 30 percent.
sentences.cn: 使用辅助技术的生育疗法猛增了30％。
